title: Patriarch of Jerusalem and Bessenyei MCQ 3

content.question: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of the positions expressed by the authors of the two sources regarding the idea that existing political boundaries should be changed so that each nation has its own state?

choices.label: Source 1 explicitly supports the idea, but Source 2 explicitly rejects it.
Source 1 explicitly rejects the idea, but Source 2 explicitly supports it.
Both Source 1 and Source 2 explicitly support the idea.
Neither Source 1 nor Source 2 explicitly supports the idea.

content.answer: Neither Source 1 nor Source 2 explicitly supports the idea.

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
